00206     // Is made a friend to avoid needless copying of strings.
00207     friend int CmpAny(const CPath& ArgA, const CPath& ArgB);
00208 };
00209 
00210 // Make CPath printable in CFormat
00211 template<>
00212 inline CFormat& CFormat::operator%(CPath value)
00213 {
00214     return this->operator%<const wxString&>(value.GetPrintable());
00215 }
00216 
00222 inline int CmpAny(const CPath& ArgA, const CPath& ArgB)
00223 {
00224     return ArgA.m_printable.CmpNoCase(ArgB.m_printable);
00225 }
